name: src/utils/middleware.js

content:
# Hemsut API

**ToDo**: Elevator pitch.

## Setup

1. Clone the repository.
2. Fetch the dependencies with `$ npm install` or `$ yarn`.
3. Create a **PostgreSQL** database and update the [config](knexfile.js) file.
4. Run the migrations with `$ npm run migrate:latest`.
3. Start the server with `$ npm run dev` to watch for file changes during development.

## Testing

* Place unit tests in tests/unit and end to end tests in tests/e2e
* `$ npm test` runs all tests
* `$ npm run e2e-tests` runs end to end tests
* `$ npm run unit-tests` runs unit tests
* `$ npm run tdd` runs unit tests in watch mode

## Stack

**ToDo**

## Creators

* [Dagmar Timmreck](https://github.com/DagmarTimmreck)
* [Mario Krajacic](https://github.com/thinktwice13)
* [Yuka Masuda](https://github.com/ykmsd)
* [Andrs Prez](https://github.com/Oxyrus)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "hemsut-api",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "The Hemsut API",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node src/index.js",
    "dev": "nodemon src/index.js",
    "test": "mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive ./tests --exit",
    "e2e-tests": "mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive ./tests/e2e --exit",
    "unit-tests": "mocha --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive ./tests/unit",
    "tdd": "npm run unit-tests -- --watch",
    "migrate:latest": "node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:latest",
    "migrate:rollback": "node_modules/.bin/knex migrate:rollback"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/chingu-voyage3/bears-31-api.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "hemsut",
    "chingu",
    "express",
    "rest"
  ],
  "author": "bears-31",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/chingu-voyage3/bears-31-api/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/chingu-voyage3/bears-31-api#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "bcrypt": "^1.0.3",
    "body-parser": "^1.18.2",
    "bookshelf": "^0.12.0",
    "cors": "^2.8.4",
    "express": "^4.16.2",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.1.0",
    "knex": "^0.14.2",
    "morgan": "^1.9.0",
    "pg": "^7.4.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-class-properties": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.13.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^12.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.8.0",
    "mocha": "^4.0.1",
    "nodemon": "^1.12.7",
    "supertest": "^3.0.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
